name: Appl and Orang The Big Advatr Gameboy Edition (All three Editions!!)
name_original: Appl and Orang The Big Advatr Gameboy Edition (All three Editions!!)
description:
This is appl and orang, but on gameboy.

Controls:

A to jump.

A to interact (for Bamama edition its B)

Hold B to run.

Use D-Pad to control!
